( shiro ) boku nitotte nin ni nari kiru koto wa muzukashī ｡

soshite kore wa omaetachi jukensei no tame no junbi kikan de mo aru ｡
( ｶﾝｸﾛｳ )《 kono jijī itsumo tōmawashi ni īyagatte 》

mienai teki to tatakau koto o sōtei shite okonawaretekita ｡

♬ sōsa kanashimi o yasashi sa ni
♬ jibunrashi sa o chikara ni

♬ arukidashite

tsugi no ichi hatsu de keri o tsukeru ！
shōshinshōmei honto no honto ni
kore de saigo dattebayo ！ 〉

Episode 87

♬( ｵｰﾌﾟﾆﾝｸﾞﾃｰﾏ )
♬ kewashī shura no michi no naka
♬ tanin no chizu o hirogete doko e iku ？
♬ gokusaishoku no karasu ga
♬ sore o ubaitotte yaburi suteta
♬ sā kokoro no me mihiraite

♬ iza sanrō ！
♬～

Episode 102

♬( ｵｰﾌﾟﾆﾝｸﾞﾃｰﾏ )

( ｼｶﾏﾙ )《 shuriken ga surinuketa tokoro o miruto
arya hotondo shitsuryō none e han busshitsu ｡

( ｼｶｸ ) shika maruyo o ｡

mendoku se e ｡

ā … kedo otoko demone e ｡
temē wa tada no koshinukeda ｡
omae ga nin o yamete mo ninmu wa tsuzuku ｡
dareka ga yaranaki yanannēnda ｡
omae no nakama wa mata betsu no taichō no shita
shutsudō suru dakeda ｡
sokode omae no nakama wa shinu kamo shirenē ｡
daga moshi sono toki taichō ga omaedattara …
nakama wa sō narazu ni sumu kamo shirenē ｡

Episode 146

♬ ( ｵｰﾌﾟﾆﾝｸﾞﾃｰﾏ )

♬ shōnenyo kītekure
♬ ningen nante taishita mon janaisa
♬ ashita nante mō iranaikara

♬ subete no wakamono wa itta
dōshi yomo naku kudaranai

♬ subete no hontō to uso o

♬ karappo no kono machi de
♬ subete no wakamono wa okonatta
fū no nai kono yoru ni

( ﾅﾚｰｼｮﾝ )〈 erizabesu o sukūbeku tatakai o tsuzuketeiru tachi ｡
ippō heru buramu to no tatakai ni idomu dattaga
sono attōtekina chikara o mae ni
hinshi no jōtai ni oikomareteshimau ｡
soko e araware heru buramu no kōgeki ni aragau kingu ｡

♬ kakinarase sonzai o koko ni iruto …

♬ kawarīku kisetsu no naka o
♬ ikinuku tabi ni bokura
♬ chie to tsuyo sa o te ni iretakedo

♬ deaeta bokura ichi nin janai

( maru ko ) sā minna atsumatte ｡｢ chibi maru ko chan ｣ ga hajimaruyo ！

Episode 194

♬ kakinarase sonzai o koko ni iruto …

dantaisen no junkesshō shiteru tokoro ｡

♬ sabita kokoro no tobira no kagi wa
♬ itsumo chikaku de
♬ waratteirukara
♬～
gata no nai yorokobi o mitsuketaikara
♬ kakenuketeiku yari no ame ga futte mo

kō ga nai to iwarete mo
